content:
Open the OpenPGP Key Manager. Select the key to be exported. File - Export Public Key(s) To File

Alternatively, right-click a key - Export Public Key(s) To File
creator: christ1

content:
You may want to talk to your email provider.

Also see https://support.mozilla.org/kb/cannot-send-messages
creator: christ1

content:
You have to have an existing email address with an email provider, e.g. Gmail, or Yahoo, etc. If you don't have an email address yet, create an account with the email provider of your choice.

Then, in Thunderbird set up your account: At the top right of the Thunderbird window, click the menu button â‰¡ > New Account - Email
